an4.22:1.4: netaṁ → metaṁ (si, sya-all, km, mr); ne (pts1ed)
an4.22:2.2: nayime → na vatime (bj); nacayime (sya-all, km); na vata me (pts1ed)
an4.22:4.4: sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ → sātthā sabyañjanā (bj); sātthā savyañjanā (pts1ed) | kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ → kevalaparipuṇṇā (bj) | dhātā → dhatā (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
an4.22:6.3: Saññato dhīro dhammesu → saññato dhīradhammesu (bj); saṁyutto thiradhammesu (sya-all, km)
